title: DAEDALUS Data
text: daedalus.data package repository handle input data files daedalus, Jameel Institute’s combined economic-epidemiological model emerging respiratory pandemic diseases. daedalus.data prepares data objects used daedalus (see ) model.

title: DAEDALUS Data
text: can install development version daedalus.data Jameel Institute R-universe : GitHub GitHub :
code: installation from R-universe install.packages(  "daedalus.data",  repos = c(    "https://jameel-institute.r-universe.dev", "https://cloud.r-project.org"  ) ) install.packages("pak") pak::pak("jameel-institute/daedalus.data")

title: DAEDALUS Data
text: daedalus.data daedalus active development. use , alwasy ensure latest versions main branch.

title: DAEDALUS Data
text: package contains following data sets:

title: DAEDALUS Data
text: Users can select infection parameters among seven epidemics caused directly-transmitted viral respiratory pathogens, stored package daedalus.data::infection_data, epidemic identifiers stored daedalus.data::epidemic_names.

title: DAEDALUS Data
text: DAEDALUS DAEDALUS Compare

what: Pandemic response strategy data for DAEDALUS — closure_data
title: Pandemic response strategy data for DAEDALUS — closure_data
text: Coefficients openness economic sectors different pandemic response strategies. four strategies (including response, identified "none").

title: Pandemic response strategy data for DAEDALUS — closure_data
Pandemic response strategy data for DAEDALUS — closure_data
text: list 4 elements, corresponding pandemic response strategy, vector N_ECONOMIC_SECTORS (45) giving coefficients sector openness. none economic sectors fully open pandemic response. elimination Openness coefficients elimination strategy. economic_closures Openness coefficients strategy mostly economic closures. school_closures Openness coefficients strategy mostly school closures.

title: Pandemic response strategy data for DAEDALUS — closure_data
text: Multiple sources; updated shortly. See processing details `data-raw/closure_data.R

what: Country demographic data for DAEDALUS — country_data
title: Country demographic data for DAEDALUS — country_data
text: Country-wise data demography, social contacts, workforce participation economic sectors, gross value added (GVA) per economic sector. Demography social contacts presented four bins: [0, 4], [5, 19], [20, 64], [65, ] (combining individuals aged 65 higher). Workforce participation presented counts assumed subset [20, 64] age-bin. GVA data presented terms million dollars per day. Note zero values worker participation data may reflect missing data particular sector.

title: Country demographic data for DAEDALUS — country_data
Country demographic data for DAEDALUS — country_data
text: list 197 elements, corresponding recognised country territory. demography four value named vector number individuals demographic group. contact_matrix 16-element square matrix giving mean number social contacts individuals four age groups. workers 45-element vector giving number individuals economic sector included model. gva 45-element vector giving daily gross value added economic sector model, million dollars.

title: Country demographic data for DAEDALUS — country_data
text: doi:10.1126/science.abc0035  OECD; see processing details `data-raw/country_data.R

what: Country names and ISO codes for DAEDALUS — country_names_codes
title: Country names and ISO codes for DAEDALUS — country_names_codes
text: Names character codes countries provided package. Note country names commonly used names may official names. country_names: Country names; country_codes_iso3c: ISO 3166 alpha 3 (3 character) codes; country_codes_iso2c: ISO 3166 alpha 2 (2 character) codes;

title: Country names and ISO codes for DAEDALUS — country_names_codes
Country names and ISO codes for DAEDALUS — country_names_codes
text: Character vectors recognised country names, 3-character 2-character codes. object class character length 67. object class character length 67.

title: Country names and ISO codes for DAEDALUS — country_names_codes
text: Country codes taken ISO 3166 specification generated country names using countrycode::countrycode().

what: Economic sector contacts data for DAEDALUS — economic_contacts
title: Economic sector contacts data for DAEDALUS — economic_contacts
text: Data per-capita social contacts within economic sector DAEDALUS model.

title: Economic sector contacts data for DAEDALUS — economic_contacts
Economic sector contacts data for DAEDALUS — economic_contacts
text: list two elements: contacts_workplace numeric vector N_ECON_SECTORS (45) elements, giving per-capita contacts workers within economic sector. contacts_between_sectors square matrix values set \(10^{-6}\), diagonal set zero, number contacts workers across economic sectors.

title: Economic sector contacts data for DAEDALUS — economic_contacts
text: Adapted doi:10.1016/j.epidem.2024.100778 ; see processing details `data-raw/economic_contacts.R

what: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: Infection parameters used DAEDALUS simulate epidemics interest. epidemic_names provides tags epidemics known users' convenience.

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: list 7 elements, corresponding epidemic (see Details), providing 10 infection parameters: r0: single numeric value basic reproduction value infection \(R_0\). sigma: single numeric value > 0.0 rate transition exposed compartment one two infectious compartments. p_sigma: single numeric value range \((0.0, 1.0)\) proportion infectious individuals also symptomatic. Asymptomatic individuals can different contribution force infection symptomatic individuals. epsilon: single numeric value relative contribution asymptomatic infectious individuals force infection (compared symptomatic individuals). gamma_Is: single numeric value recovery rate infectious individuals hospitalised. gamma_Ia: single numeric value recovery rate asymptomatic infection. gamma_H_recovery: single numeric value rate transition hospital admission recovery. gamma_H_death: single numeric value rate transition hospital admission death. hfr: numeric vector length 4 age-specific hospital fatality ratio. eta: numeric vector length N_AGE_GROUPS (4) age-specific hospitalisation rate individuals infectious symptomatic. rho: single numeric value rate infection-derived immunity wanes, returning individuals 'recovered' compartment 'susceptible' compartment.

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: character vector 10 names infection parameters infection_data. Mainly internal use.

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: character vector 7 elements.

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: See processing details `data-raw/infection_data.R

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
text: Epidemics data available (pathogen parentheses): SARS 2004 (SARS-CoV-1) Influenza 2009 (influenza H1N1) Influenza 1957 (influenza H2N2) Influenza 1918 (influenza H1N1) Covid-19 wild type (SARS-Cov-2 wild type) Covid-19 Omicron (SARS-CoV-2 omicron) Covid-19 Delta (SARS-CoV-2 delta).

title: Infection characteristics for model epidemics — epidemic_data
Life expectancies and values — life_value
text: Data country- age-group-specific life expectancy, values dollars (scaled purchasing power parity) statistical life lost four DAEDALUS age groups, accounting life expectancy.

title: Life expectancies and values — life_value
text: list 67 elements, corresponding country territory, giving age-group-specific value statistical life lost. list element numeric vector four values giving value per age group, following order: 0-4, 5-19, 20-65, 65+.

title: Life expectancies and values — life_value
text: list 67 elements, corresponding country territory, giving GNI (gross national income) international dollars.

title: Life expectancies and values — life_value
text: list 67 elements, corresponding country territory, giving life expectancy years.

title: Life expectancies and values — life_value
text: Multiple sources; see processing details `data-raw/life_value.R. Multiple sources; see processing details `data-raw/life_value.R. Multiple sources; see processing details `data-raw/life_value.R.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: Vaccination parameters four main pre-pandemic scenarios pre-pandemic investments vaccine development delivery. vaccination_scenario_names provides names advance vaccine investment scenarios known.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: object class character length 4. object class character length 5.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: list 4 elements, corresponding advance vaccine investment strategy. element list three values (see Details). vax_start_time: single number vaccination start time days. nu: single number daily vaccination rate percentage population vaccinated. vax_uptake_limit: single number percentage population willing vaccinated.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: character vector four elements giving identifier scenario.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: character vector three elements giving identifier vaccination parameters.

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: See processing details `data-raw/vaccination_data.R

title: Vaccine investment scenario parameters — vaccine_scenarios
text: scenario three parameters; parameters differ across age groups. Vaccination start time: time days vaccination begins. Vaccination rate: rate, percentage population vaccinated per day. Vaccination uptake limit: percentage population willing accept vaccination.

title: daedalus.data 0.0.2
text: Pass age-specific HFR process conditional probability daedalus.

title: daedalus.data 0.0.1
text: Initial package setup. per Jameel institute layout, includes GitHub Actions workflow code quality checks: GH Actions workflows R CMD check (fails ‘NOTE’) code test coverage; Linting, citation update, Readme rendering, license year update workflows; Spellchecking known words list. data files functions ported daedalus Basic data test implemented.
